| Class 465 trains formed of 12 coaches are not permitted in Platforms 4, 5 and 6                                      |                                          |                                                                  |

| *  An arrival on Platform 4 can take place at the same time as a departure from platform 5 or platform 6 (there is a |                                          |                                                                  |

| long run in from 654 points crossover and intermediate signal TL17 on the Down Fast)                                 |                                          |                                                                  |

| Permissive Working for attaching/detaching and platform sharing is authorised as shown below:                        |                                          |                                                                  |

| At London termini 3 minutes to be allowed if possible between arrivals on adjacent platforms to allow customers      |                                          |                                                                  |

| to clear in the morning and evening peak                                                                             |                                          |                                                                  |

| * - 11‚ÅÑ2 minutes is permissible but not for successive moves                                                         |                                          |                                                                  |
